DOC.detailed_description: Methodology : DESIGN : Retrospective observational study single center , non-interventional Term study 2 year , retrospectively Acquisition data : - Study computer file : report available DxCare hospital Cora - Collection data excel spreadsheet - Statistical analysis : local management - Anonymity data : - For subject award identifier ( original name surname - year birth ) data enter computer file send statistician charge analyze GHPSJ site . There exchange personal data study single center site GHPSJ . Development study : - Procedure : - Series includable patient PMSI data - Select folder accord inclusion criterion - Collecting information file Excel spreadsheet internal charge data collection ( Sylvain CHAWKI ) - Statistical Analysis - Writing Article - Expected duration patient recruitment : Retrospective 2 half year January 1 , 2013 April 31 , 2015
